explains: v. 投资；授与（invest 的现在分词）

sentences.en: By investing wisely she accumulated a fortune.
sentences.cn: 她投资精明，积累了一笔财富。

sentences.en: Investing in airlines is a very risky business.
sentences.cn: 投资航空公司是非常冒险的生意。

sentences.en: The company has been investing in new plant and equipment.
sentences.cn: 这家公司一直在投资购置新机器和设备。
